nodes.bodyText:
Please make the variable final.
Move the declaration of the variable near the usage - after skipDelay definition.
Seems we can combine this condition with above.
Let's make it less cryptic and create separate variable for rubiconVideoParams.getSizeId() value.

Usually by the project code style, we name such methods as resolveXXX(..).
In this case we can name it like resolveVideoSizeId(..).
